name: mcp-scratchpad
description: Shared workspace for inter-agent collaboration with three pillars: Notes (raw findings), Draft (structured document), and Plan (task checklist). Session ID is injected via X-Session-ID HTTP header for security isolation.

sessionIsolation.description: Session ID is NOT a tool parameter. It is injected by the orchestrator via X-Session-ID HTTP header. This ensures AI agents cannot access other sessions.
sessionIsolation.enforcement: Server rejects requests without valid X-Session-ID header

tools.name: add_note
tools.description: Add a raw note, finding, or fact to the shared workspace. Use this to share information that might be useful for other agents.

tools.name: read_notes
tools.description: Read notes from the workspace, optionally filtering by query or tag

query.description: Optional text to search for in note content

tools.name: write_draft_section
tools.description: Write or overwrite a section of the structured draft document

content.description: The full text content of the section

tools.name: read_draft
tools.description: Read the current draft, either a specific section or the full document

section_id.description: If provided, returns only that section. If null, returns full draft.

tools.name: add_tasks
tools.description: Add one or more tasks to the shared plan. Use this to define what work needs to be done and track dependencies.

dependencies.description: List of task IDs that must be completed first

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update a task's status or assignment

assigned_to.description: Optional agent ID to assign the task to

tools.name: read_plan
tools.description: Read the current plan/checklist of tasks
